title: Crazy Power Disk Perfect
description:
Hey guys sorry about the last upload I messed up on 2 files, but, here is the fix all archives have been tested and working and now I included and sfv file use QuickSFV to verify your files www.quicksfv.org/ and recheck/redownload if there is any corrupt files. I hope you enjoy this game as much as I do :D

*******************************************************************************
                           Crazy Power Disc Perfect
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game
Platform.............: Windows 9x/ME/2000/XP/Vista
Image Format.........: .iso
Image Created with...: Magic Iso




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Originally Posted by............: XyPhO
Reposted by.....................: roninStyle

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This is a remake of the famous Arcade game Neo Geo WindJammers
To play in full screen press ALT + ENTER.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Mount in a virtual drive with software like wincdemu/daemon tools/alcohol 52% or Burn Image with any burning software.
If autorun doesnt load just start the Setup.exe.
After the installation is complete enjoy!
